title: ULTRA LOW GRAPHICS
body: Are you one of themthat lagg.. Like having 16 fps....  yeah. Low Graphics are not enough, wee need ultra low Graphics like, the grass are just green, no shadows. monsters are just 1 colour, many people download mods for having ultra low Graphics....

replies.body: Honestly sounds like you're not having fun at all! If you[ submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) over to our tech team we can work with you to help get your client and game working enjoyably for you.
